about_the_game:
Perhaps one day, you might find yourself in a strange land, feeling helpless and alone. In this world, you are known as Ayni.

Each world in this game has only one tool, and you must use it to overcome any challenge.

In the Bubble World, there are Bubble Generating Agencies that you can use to float in the sky and complete all the challenges. These devices can also slow down your descent and protect you.


In the Hot World, there is a Fire Column Switch that controls the movement of walls and land, enabling you to navigate the entire scene and pass through levels. The core challenge of this chapter is designing through bubbles, while the core challenge of the Flame World is using the switch - fire can turn it on or off.


You can purchase various roles from the store, including a ninja, a bear man, an eggshell gentleman, future No. 1, Miku, and more.


Different challenges reflect different principles that can inspire you to think about real-life situations. As you explore the world, you'll encounter interesting challenges that go beyond your imagination. Of course, there are also dangerous and exciting challenges, such as dealing with the Lords of Element.

Each level may look small, but it requires you to activate your brain to complete it. If you get stuck, you can open the in-game tips to get inspired.

Key Features

  • Short, intricately designed levels.
  • Unpredictable ways to pass each level.
  • You can do almost anything with just one kind of trap - it requires some imagination!
  • Learn how to do things in each challenge by reading the level.
  • Find the roles you like in the store.
  • Enjoy easy, wonderful music that plays at random.

Ready and Go!
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord


About the Game

Perhaps one day, you might find yourself in a strange land, feeling helpless and alone. In this world, you are known as Ayni.

Each world in this game has only one tool, and you must use it to overcome any challenge.

In the Bubble World, there are Bubble Generating Agencies that you can use to float in the sky and complete all the challenges. These devices can also slow down your descent and protect you.


In the Hot World, there is a Fire Column Switch that controls the movement of walls and land, enabling you to navigate the entire scene and pass through levels. The core challenge of this chapter is designing through bubbles, while the core challenge of the Flame World is using the switch - fire can turn it on or off.


You can purchase various roles from the store, including a ninja, a bear man, an eggshell gentleman, future No. 1, Miku, and more.


Different challenges reflect different principles that can inspire you to think about real-life situations. As you explore the world, you'll encounter interesting challenges that go beyond your imagination. Of course, there are also dangerous and exciting challenges, such as dealing with the Lords of Element.

Each level may look small, but it requires you to activate your brain to complete it. If you get stuck, you can open the in-game tips to get inspired.

Key Features

  • Short, intricately designed levels.
  • Unpredictable ways to pass each level.
  • You can do almost anything with just one kind of trap - it requires some imagination!
  • Learn how to do things in each challenge by reading the level.
  • Find the roles you like in the store.
  • Enjoy easy, wonderful music that plays at random.

Ready and Go!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X v10.6, and above
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon HD 2400 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Ayni Fairyland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Gigahertz(GHz) or faster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
